com.konakart.app

Class PunchOutOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.konakart.app.PunchOutOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PunchOutOptionsIf

    public class PunchOutOptions
extends java.lang.Object
implements PunchOutOptionsIf
    This object contains attributes used to configure Punch Out API calls.

      • getStandard

        public java.lang.String getStandard()
        The standard for the returned XML. If left empty or null, then the OCI Standard is used. Valid values are:
        • com.konakart.app.PunchOutOptions.OCI_HTML - OCI standard using HTML messages
        • com.konakart.app.PunchOutOptions.OCI_XML - OCI standard using XML messages
        Specified by:
        getStandard in interface PunchOutOptionsIf
        Returns:
        the standard

        • com.konakart.app.PunchOutOptions.OCI_HTML - OCI standard using HTML messages
        • com.konakart.app.PunchOutOptions.OCI_XML - OCI standard using XML messages
        Specified by:
